paragrafo1: The Supernova Studios is a animation company created in Brazil
paragrafo2: We have the objective to expand and to show our brazilian creativity to the world
paragrafo3: Created in 2020 in a school project we have with us at least 3 years of history!
paragrafo4: We have animation projects planned for 2028 and several animators working with us.
paragrafo5: Our current projects are: The Good Reaper, Midnight Riders, Merlin Descendents and The Ghost Team
